01.Opcode Description: Start of If block. Byte 2 = length.

02.Opcode Description: Start of Else block. Byte 2 = length.

03.Opcode Description: Marks the end of an If/ElseIf/Else block.

04.Opcode Description: Selects Player or Entity before performing an action.

ScdId.Description: Sub Script ID to jump to

05.Opcode Description: Sets the specified system flag and bit ID to the given On/Off state.

EMD.Description: EMD/Enemy to change to on door load.

09.Opcode Description: Change to camera number specified in byte 2.

0C.Opcode Description: Creates a door to another room.

0D.Opcode Description: Create a zone for various uses (Message, Typewriter, Itembox, etc.).

14.Opcode Description: Run Sub## in byte 4 in conjunction with current sub.

16.Opcode Description: Stop the music in the current room.

18.Opcode Description: Place item & model with function at location with specific flags.

1A.Opcode Description: Check if player has item in inventory.

ItemId.Description: ID of the item to check

1B.Opcode Description: Place entity in state at location with flags.

20.Opcode Description: Move selected entity to location with specified rotation.

21.Opcode Description: Immediately move selected entity to another location.

23.Opcode Description: Allows camera to switch automatically after a Cut_chg.

24.Opcode Description: Activate an AOT (Area of Trigger) in the room.

25.Opcode Description: Disables certain masks or overlays in the game.

MaskId.Description: ID of the mask to disable

28.Opcode Description: Adds a follower to the player. Length can vary (4, 6, or 8 bytes).

NPCID.Description: ID of the NPC to add as a follower

29.Opcode Description: Play a movie specified by the ID.

MovieId.Description: ID of the movie to play

2A.Opcode Description: Play a special effect in the game.

2C.Opcode Description: Remove an item from the player's inventory.

ItemId.Description: ID of the item to remove

83.Opcode Description: Move the entity in the workset.

84.Opcode Description: Load an animation on the workset entity.

86.Opcode Description: Unlock the animation state of the entity.

88.Opcode Description: Rotate the entity in the workset.

F8.Opcode Description: Pause execution for a specified number of frames.

FA.Opcode Description: Initialize a FOR loop to execute a block multiple times.

FC.Opcode Description: Set up a WHILE loop or instruction block.

FE.Opcode Description: Pause execution or process pending tasks.
